subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Meb Keflezighi and Alan Culpepper have entered the United States Olympic team trials that will be held Nov. 3 in Central Park. Dan Browne will also try for a spot on the American squad for the 2008 Beijing Olympics, USA Track and Field and the New York Road Runners said yesterday. Keflezighi won a silver medal in the marathon at the 2004 Athens Games, and Culpepper finished 12th. Browne competed in the 10,000 meters and the marathon in Athens.
